scripts.prepare-ts:mumbai: mkdir -p src/mappings/generated && mustache config/mumbai.json src/mappings/constants.template.ts > src/mappings/generated/constants.ts
scripts.codegen:mumbai: yarn prepare-all:mumbai && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/ subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare-ts:arbitrum-rinkeby: mkdir -p src/mappings/generated && mustache config/arbitrum-rinkeby.json src/mappings/constants.template.ts > src/mappings/generated/constants.ts
scripts.codegen:arbitrum-rinkeby: yarn prepare-all:arbitrum-rinkeby && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/ subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare-ts:arbitrum-one: mkdir -p src/mappings/generated && mustache config/arbitrum-one.json src/mappings/constants.template.ts > src/mappings/generated/constants.ts
scripts.codegen:arbitrum-one: yarn prepare-all:arbitrum-one && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/ subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:local: yarn prepare:local && graph deploy dolomite-exchange/dolomite-v2 --debug --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy dolomite-exchange/dolomite-v2 --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug
scripts.deploy:mumbai-local: yarn prepare-all:mumbai && graph deploy dolomite-exchange/dolomite-v2-mumbai --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://localhost:8020/
